name: Snap! Prototype
description:
The result of a day long experiment I undertook to see whether or not I could recreate Pokemon Snap's core gameplay into my own unity project.

A very short playable demo version is available, as well as the project files - this is completely free for anybody to poke around in and have a go at tinkering with, but if you use it for something commercial I'd appreciate a mention.

Controls:

Mouse - Aim Camera
Hold Right Mouse Button  - Zoom In
Press Left Click - Take Photo


Uses the following free assets:

Bezier Path Creator:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/b-zier-path-creator-136082

Low Poly Cliff Pack:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/low-poly-cliff-pack-67289

Low Poly Rock Pack:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/low-poly-rock-pack-57874

Low Poly Fence Pack:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/low-poly-fence-pack-61661
